name: Mall Ghost
description:
MALL GHOST

You are a ghost parasite stuck in endless malls and must get out. The only problem is, you can't stop devouring people as soon as you see them. And when people die, the police arrive and the store closes. Guess what! YOU CAN'T ESCAPE WHEN THE STORE IS CLOSED!

CONTROLS

Left Click - Shoot Grapple, release to release the grapple.

Mouse - Move the parasite towards the mouse (when grappled)'

ESC - Open/Close pause menu.
